de.uni_stuttgart.ims.compranking.rank

Class AspectFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.ims.compranking.rank.AspectFilter

  • public class AspectFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    Determine whether a found aspect phrase belongs to a top-level aspect.
    Author:
    kesslewd

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AspectFilter()
      Don't filter or aggregate, just consider everything.
      AspectFilter(java.lang.String filename)
      Filter and aggregate according to list of aspects in file.
      AspectFilter(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String normaspect)
      Filter for one aspect and according to list of aspects in file.

    • Field Detail

      • useOverlap

        boolean useOverlap
        Determines when a phrase is considered to refer to a norm aspect. If set to true, overlap with one the aspect terms is enough, if set to false, there needs to be an exact match.

      • topLevelAspect

        public static AspectFilter.NormAspect topLevelAspect
        The special top-level aspect 'all aspects'

      • relevantAspect

        private AspectFilter.NormAspect relevantAspect
        The current relevant aspect

      • aspectMappings

        Mappings from aspect phrases to normalized aspects.

      • getNormAspect

        public java.util.List<AspectFilter.NormAspect> getNormAspect(java.lang.String phrase)
        Determine to which norm aspect[s] the string belongs (if any). If the phrase does not express any aspect, an empty list is returned.
